EmailTemplate.description: Email template used to send reminders about a dealers docs going out to compliance soon.
EmailTemplate.name: Capital Dealer Doc Expiration Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Dealer Doc Expiring Soon for Account {!Dealer_Docs__c.Account__c}, {!Dealer_Docs__c.Dealer_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Dealer_Docs__c.Account__c},
The {!Dealer_Docs__c.Document_Type__c} we have on file for you is about to expire. Please provide a current document before the expiration date of {!Dealer_Docs__c.Expiration_Date__c} or your ACV Capital account may be suspended.
Please respond to {!Dealer_Docs__c.Reply_To_Email__c} with a copy of the most recent {!Dealer_Docs__c.Document_Type__c}.
Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.
Your ACV Capital Team
